00054 //----------------------------------------------------------
00055 template< typename _T >
00056 void
00057 ThThread::Start( _T* owner, unsigned int ( _T::*proc )( void* ), void* param,
00058                                  unsigned int stackSize, bool suspended )
00059 {
00061         B_ASSERT( proc != 0 );
00062 
00064         _proc = ( GenericFuncPtr )proc;
00065         _owner = owner;
00066         _param = param;
00067 
00069         unsigned int threadId = 0;
00070         unsigned int createFlags = suspended ? CREATE_SUSPENDED : 0;
00071         _thread = _beginthreadex( 0, stackSize, ThreadMain< _T >, param, createFlags, &threadId );
00072 
00075         if ( _thread )
00076         {
00077                 while ( !_started )
00078                 {
00079                         __asm pause;
00080                 }
00081         }
00082 }

00089 //----------------------------------------------------------
00090 template< typename _T >
00091 unsigned int
00092 ThThread::ThreadMain( void* threadThis )
00093 {
00095         typedef unsigned int ( _T::*MemberFuncPtr )( void* );
00096 
00098         ThThread* thread = ( ThThread* )threadThis;
00099 
00101         MemberFuncPtr proc = ( MemberFuncPtr )thread->_proc;
00102 
00104         _T*     owner = ( _T* )( thread->_owner );
00105 
00107         void* param = thread->_param;
00108 
00110         thread->_started = true;
00111         unsigned int retVal = ( owner->*proc )( param );
00112         thread->_ended = true;
00113 
00115         return retVal;
00116 }
